Humanology Project

I worked with the NGO behind the Humanology Project trough Catchafire looking to help them improve their brand with a better platform.
Humanology Project is a NGO that works to de-stigmatize mental illness.
The home from the new design. It is divided between the main concepts Ethos, Pathos and Logos, respectively, scientific articles about mental illness, opinatory and experiential articles, and courses.
The screens for Ethos and Pathos, since they are very similar in structure.
The screen for the Logos section, which objective wasn't properly defined by the stakeholder. And was after postponed to a future version.
The screen for the About section, containing all the information on the NGO's personnel, alumni and objectives.
